verbs.description: [V: sloss] [ARG1: fest] calls it quits after grappling with weather woes in 2018 prolonged evacuations on the festival site at sloss furnaces resulted in angry complaints from concertgoers many of whom asked for refunds sloss fright furnace festivalgoers chris stapleton seasick records stage sloss fest jason isbell weather birmingham facebook sloss sloss furnaces
